text:
Think Big | Mountain View + NY + Boston + Salt Lake City | Staff + Senior + Principal Data Engineers

Think Big is an engineering and analytics firm that focuses on Big Data for clients ranging from startups to Fortune 500 companies. We are hiring engineers in the cities mentioned on our career page.

https://thinkbiganalytics.com/big-data-careers/open-position...

I'm a data engineer here. If you are interested or want more details, send an email with your resume to jonathan.edwards@thinkbiganalytics.com
